description:
**NEW UPDATE (1.0.2)**
- Adds a menu so you can quit, pause and restart the current level.
- Adds a help screen that should explain for the few of you that were having trouble figuring it out.
(No new levels, yet!)


A classic chain reaction game. Has 24 stages that makes getting all 72 stars a challenge!

This game was created within 12 hours and the coding time-lapse can be seen on YouTube here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pqZ5MMrJL_Q
versionNote:
Adds a menu so you can quit, pause and restart the current level.
Adds a help screen that should explain for the few of you that were having trouble figuring it out.
